==Trivia==
*Meisterschwert's effect working regardless of who initiates combat is accurate to [[Brave Weapons]] in general in all [[Games|''Fire Emblem'' games]] released between {{FE|4}} and {{FE|13}}, inclusive. 
**The restriction on other Brave Weapons in {{FE|H}} to only works when the user initiates combat was introduced in {{FE|14}}.
*Unlike its iteration in {{FE|5}}, Meisterschwert has more might than and harder attainability than a {{St|Brave Sword}} in {{FE|H}}.
